The reason of the error is unknown to me also but it needed to be specified in the -noloading <argument> as the property file was not sufficient to avoid the Exception.

I cannot workout the origin of the problem...
If some Sun Engineer could give me some info over teh origin of the matter I would appreciate !

Thomas,
